name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeadEpic – LinkedIn Automated Lead Research + Content Generation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeadEpic automates LinkedIn lead research and AI content generation for B2B sales teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LeadEpic for LinkedIn makes researching prospects and creating sales content effortless. 

Save hours every day. Create branded content in just a few clicks. No technical skills required. 


⏱️Save hours researching leads
With this intuitive extension you can sit back and relax as we do the time-intensive work of researching prospects for you – simply identify a prospect in LinkedIn and our extension will analyze all of their posts + information, delivering a comprehensive profile of the the prospect in seconds

🫱🏼‍🫲🏾Connect with potential customers effortlessly
LeadEpic is developed with the input of top B2B sales professionals, offering best-in-class content generation for outreach, meeting prep and more. Automatically generate a profile of any LinkedIn lead in seconds, then create AI-generated messaging, discovery questions, call warm-up that’s customized to you and your business in just a click. 

✍🏼Customized to you and your business
Our proprietary technology can customize the research delivered and content created based on the specifics of your business – helping you save time sifting through data or editing generic AI content.

🕵️‍♂️ Everyone is a seasoned sales professional
LeadEpic helps sales reps, marketers, founders and recruiters quickly and easily research leads and prepare to make contact.

🤑FREE
Start with a 7-day free trial, no credit card necessary. We also offer a freemium version for continued use at zero cost.

Join top B2B sales professionals who are using LeadEpic to save hours on LinkedIn everyday.

—

1️⃣2️⃣3️⃣How It Works
Identify your prospect and navigate to their Posts
Click ‘Run Analysis’ to create an automated report
Click the Action you want to take (ex. Generate Email)
And that’s it!
